system.description:
You have walked your own unconventional path for so long that you are now entirely outside of traditional structures.

You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Pact Boon improves.

  • If you have Pact of the Blade, your weapon attacks with your pact weapon deal bonus radiant or necrotic damage (choose when you use this ability) equal to your proficiency bonus.

  • If you have Pact of the Chain, you may have any spell with a range of self that you cast originate from your familiar instead of from you.

  • If you have Pact of the Tome, you may transform your Book of Shadows into a copy of any other non-magical book you have read as a bonus action. In addition, choose 3 spells of 3rd level or lower from classes you do not have levels in. Each spell must be from a different class’s list. While you have your book of shadows, these spells count as warlock spells for you and do not count against your spells known.

  • You gain an additional secret of arcana and an additional sign of faith. Neither counts against the maximum number of its respective type you can know.
